name: HIROSHIMA 2016: Sean Hogan Visits Japan
description:
A very short adventure about Obama visiting Hiroshima, recent crimes in Japan, Okinawa, Idols, and Sean Hogan visiting Japan.

Recommended to anyone interested in Japan.

This game is free and should not be paid for.

5/27/2016
